articles.title: Axiata, Telenor, Digi ink deals for proposed Celcom-Digi merger; combined pre-synergy equity value close to RM50b - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (June 21): Axiata Group Bhd, Telenor Asia Pte Ltd and Digi.Com Bhd have successfully concluded the due diligence exercise and have inked the transaction agreements for the proposed merger of Celcom Axiata Bhd and Digi (MergeCo).In a joint stateme…

articles.title: Crazy Rich Asians star Henry Golding opens up about fatherhood - CNA
articles.description: The Snake Eyes actor said the arrival of his daughter in March has been "life changing".

articles.title: Actress Kate Yeung working as security guard due to Covid-19 limiting acting opportunities - AsiaOne
articles.description: HONG KONG - Hong Kong actress Kate Yeung, who has not appeared in public much over the past year, has been working as a security guard at a university. In an interview with Hong Kong tabloid Apple Daily, the 36-year-old revealed that she had taken on the full…

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccines do not increase risk of miscarriage, foetal anomaly: KKH doctor cites study in response to letter - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - There is no evidence of increased risks for mothers-to-be who take a Covid-19 vaccine, said experts. Data from nearly 4,000 pregnant women in the United States showed there was no greater risk of miscarriage, foetal anomaly or pre-term labour, sai…
